ProjectsArray.title: E-commerce Site
ProjectsArray.description: An e-commerce site is an online platform that facilitates the buying and selling of goods and services, providing users with a virtual marketplace to browse, select, and purchase products or services.

ProjectsArray.title: Personal Portfolio
ProjectsArray.description: A personal portfolio website is a digital showcase that provides a comprehensive overview of an individual's skills, projects, and experiences, serving as a professional hub for self-promotion and showcasing their work to potential employers or clients.

ProjectsArray.title: To do list
ProjectsArray.description: A to-do list is a simple organizational tool that compiles tasks, activities, or goals into a systematic list format, aiding individuals in managing and prioritizing their responsibilities.

ProjectsArray.title: Minutes to seconds
ProjectsArray.description: A minutes-to-seconds converter is a utility that swiftly transforms time values from minutes to seconds, providing a convenient and efficient way to perform time unit conversions.

ProjectsArray.title: Area of triangle
ProjectsArray.description: An area of triangle calculator is a computational tool that enables users to quickly determine the area of a triangle by entering the required geometric measurements, streamlining the calculation process for geometric analysis.

ProjectsArray.title: Age to days
ProjectsArray.description: An age-to-days converter is a practical tool for converting a person's age into the equivalent number of days, providing a quick and convenient way to express age in a different time unit.

Resumearray.description: During my primary school years, I acquired fundamental skills in reading and writing, laying the foundation for effective communication. The curriculum not only honed my language abilities but also introduced me to a diverse range of subjects, fostering a broad understanding of various situations. Primary school provided a nurturing environment where I not only gained knowledge but also developed essential life skills crucial for my educational journey.

Throughout my high school journey, I delved into an extended and more profound realm of learning, exploring a wealth of new knowledge. Ultimately, I successfully matriculated from South Peninsula High School, achieving a Bachelorâ€™s Pass, a testament to my dedication to education. Notably, I excelled in Afrikaans, Life Skills, and History, earning distinctions in these subjects.

As a present student at Life Choices Coding Academy, my initial reservations about this field have evolved into a genuine enjoyment, and I find myself immersed in the learning process. Despite not being an initial consideration, my experience has been enriching, exposing me to a plethora of new concepts that have sparked a growing interest within me. The academy has become a dynamic environment where I not only learn but also cultivate a newfound passion for the world of coding and technology.

SkillsArray.name: HTML & CSS
SkillsArray.description: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language utilized for constructing the structure and content of web pages. CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a stylesheet language employed to enhance the presentation and visual styling of HTML elements, enabling the design and layout customization of web pages.

SkillsArray.name: Bootstrap
SkillsArray.description: Bootstrap is a comprehensive and widely-used front-end framework for web development that simplifies and accelerates the process of creating responsive, visually appealing, and consistent user interfaces.

SkillsArray.name: JavaScript
SkillsArray.description: JavaScript is a versatile and high-level programming language that is primarily used to enhance the interactivity and dynamic behavior of web pages.

SkillsArray.name: Vue
SkillsArray.description: Vue.js, often referred to as Vue, is a progressive JavaScript framework used for building user interfaces.

TestimonialsArray.name: Ammara Hoosen
TestimonialsArray.testimonial: Haanim Pietersen is not only a pleasant individual to work with, but she radiates warmth and positivity where ever she goes. She is a hard-working, dedicated and intelligent person. No matter how hectic or challenging the situation, she maintains an unwavering sense of composure and always finds a way to uplift those around her. I wholeheartedly recommend her. - Classmate

TestimonialsArray.name: Heather Mtuedwa
TestimonialsArray.testimonial: Its always a pleasure to work along side with Haanim Pietrsen. She is shy quite person but always has great positive energy, and is always willing to go the extra mile when it comes to her work. Her attention to every single detail and following what needs to be done is what makes it so great to work beside her everyday. I highly recommend Haanim Pietersen to any one that is looking for a hardworker in their team. - Classmate

TestimonialsArray.name: Matthew Dean Brown
TestimonialsArray.testimonial: Haanim is a creative individual. She shows consistency in her work ethic and ability to learn. - Lecturer

TestimonialsArray.name: Niyaaz Daniels
TestimonialsArray.testimonial: I have had the pleasure of working closely with Haanim, and I can confidently say that she is an outstanding web developer. Her technical proficiency, attention to detail, and creative approach set her apart in the field. Haanim consistently delivers high-quality work, displaying a remarkable ability to turn complex requirements into sleek and user-friendly web applications. I highly recommend Haanim for her expertise, professionalism, and dedication to excellence in web development. - Classmate

TestimonialsArray.name: Summer De Wet
TestimonialsArray.testimonial: In the time that I have known her, Haanim has proven herself to be exceptional at whatever she sets out to do,demonstrating a strong aptitude for coding and a deep passion for technology. What makes Haanim different from the rest is her unwavering commitment to excellence approaching every project with a high level of professionalism and dedication.Her attention to detail and ability to work collaboratively makes her an invaluable member of any team - Classmate

TestimonialsArray.name: Unity Demas
TestimonialsArray.testimonial: Haanim, with her exceptional work ethic and unwavering dedication, consistently stands out as a hardworking and committed classmate who sets the bar high by tirelessly striving for academic excellence and aiming for the highest marks in every undertaking. Beyond her impressive academic pursuits, she radiates positivity with her pleasant and amiable soul, making her not only a valuable asset in the pursuit of knowledge but also a delightful presence that contributes significantly to the overall camaraderie and uplifting atmosphere within the academic community. - Classmates
